title: At These Gaza Schools, ‘Peace Building’ Is Part of the Curriculum
summary_full: A fast-growing network of private schools, the brainchild of a North Carolina neurosurgeon, is teaching 9,000 war orphans and other needy Palestinian youngsters.
summary_public: A fast-growing network of private schools, the brainchild of a North Carolina neurosurgeon, is teaching 9,000 war orphans and other needy Palestinian youngsters.

IL.label: positive
